availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Davis B. Hill (Hopkins County, Tanner and farmer )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, tanner and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth J. Cossey Hill in Butler County, Kentucky, on April 11, 1836. Father of Mary A. Hill, Margaret Hill, Melinda J. Hill, Ann M. Hill, James D. Hill, Charles Hill, John D. Hill, and Thomas M. Hill. Tanner in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Madisonville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 71B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Madisonville, p. 836.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film #000367208.
